question: What is the main advantage of using feature branching in collaborative development?

answers.answer: It allows developers to work on the same codebase without any risk of conlficts
It enables developers to work on different features concurrently without affecting the main codebase
It ensures that all changes are immediately visible to all collaborators
It eliminates the need for code reviews and testing

question: What is the correct sequence of steps to merge a feature branch into the main branch?

answers.answer: Create a pull request, merge main into the feature branch, push changes, complete the pull request.
Create a pull request, push changes, merge feature branch into main, complete the pull request.
Push changes, create a pull request, complete the pull request, merge main into the feature branch.
Merge feature branch into main, create a pull request, push changes, complete the pull request.
